name: Forgotten Legends (Finalsomnia)
description:
Forgotten Legends is a traditional RPG being created using the RPG Developer Bakin software. Currently in the alpha phase of development, I'm using default Bakin assets for now to get the bones of the project in place. Current version 0.0.1.

News:

11//24/22; Released Demo version 0.0.1.  Happy Thanksgiving, if you're in the USA!
